title: FLOOD RESTORATION
content: We always available 24/7 and give preference to an emergency call regarding flood restoration and also will sort it with insurance cover.

title: WINDOW CLEANING
content: For those filthy high-rise windows, hire our window cleaners to reinvent the look of your windows and give them a spick & span makeover.

title: BUILDER CLEANING
content: Get your construction site efficiently cleaned to boost your workers morale for delivering better results. We make even the toughest jobs look easy.

title: COMMERCIAL CLEANING
content: Whether its a shopping mall or a medical facility, we will send our best cleaners to your aid for achieving results which are beyond compare.

title: OFFICE CLEANING
content: Every inch of your office property will be deeply cleaned to help motivate your employees to work at the best of their efforts.

title: HOUSE CLEANING
content: Your residential property deserves a thorough, extensive house cleaning every month or so to keep it. Looking fresh and welcoming for you as well as your guests.

title: CARPET CLEANING
content: This makes use of hot water extraction system -spraying a carpet at high pressure with a mixture of cleaning agent and very hot water.

title: SPRING CLEANING
content: Spring cleaning is one of our strong suits at Epic Cleaning Services. Consistent cleaning results at affordable prices are just a call away.

title: OVEN CLEANING
content: A germ-ridden oven will only make your family sick. To avoid the same, we use eco-friendly disinfectants for a thorough cleanse of your oven.

title: VINYL FLOOR STRIPING
content: Reinvent the look of your vinyl floor with our affordable and time-effective vinyl floor stripping services available for both residential and commercial floors.

title: END OF TENANCY CLEANING
content: Do you want your bond money back? If yes, then do not take any chances and opt for our thorough end of lease cleaning today!

title: INDUSTRIAL CLEANING
content: Your industrial floors go through heavy wear and tear every day. Cater to their needs with our floor strip and polishing experts at work at Epic Cleaning Services.

title: FLOOR TILES CLEANING
content: Keep your tiles shining like new and clean as just installed with our efficient tile & grout cleaning services. Proficiency is 100% guaranteed!

title: UPHOLSTERY CLEANING
content: The poor condition of your upholstery has a lot to say about you as a homeowner, and none of it will sound pleasing to you.
